DOC.brief_title: ProSeal Laryngeal Mask Airway ( LMA ) Size 3 vs 4 Non-paralyzed Female Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The ProSealTM laryngeal mask airway ( PLMA ; Laryngeal Mask Co. Limited , Mahe , Seychelles ) laryngeal mask device add dorsal cuff improve seal drainage tube prevent aspiration gastric insufflation ( Brain , Verghese et al . 2000 ) .Despite utility , complication associate PLMA insertion sore throat mucosal injury include oropharyngeal blood . The purpose randomize control study determine size 3 PLMA would induce less mucosal damage indicate blood cuff size 4 non-paralyzed female patient . The secondary objective study compare insertion time , number attempt , oropharyngeal leak pressure , hemodynamic variable , incidence complication size 3 4 PLMA .
DOC.criteria: female age 1880 yr American Society Anesthesiologists physical status ⅠⅡ schedule undergo short outpatient gynecological procedure use ProSealTM LMA ( PLMA ) anesthesia know predict difficult airway recent sore throat mouth open less 2.5 cm body mass index > 35 kg/m2 risk aspiration .
